mlflex.helper
Class ResultsFileUtilities

java.lang.Object
  mlflex.helper.ResultsFileUtilities

public class ResultsFileUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

This class helps with saving and retrieving scalar values to/from text files. These files are used for reporting results, etc.

Constructor Summary

Method Detail

AppendMatrixColumn

public static void AppendMatrixColumn(java.util.ArrayList<NameValuePair> nameValuePairs,
                                      java.lang.String outFilePath,
                                      java.lang.String headerComment)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
Saves a column to a text file in a table/matrix format with columns and rows. If the file does not already exist, row names are also added to the file. This method assumes that if a file already exists that the name-value pairs will be in the same order as what is in the file.

Parameters:
nameValuePairs - Name-value pairs that will be saved
outFilePath - Absolute file path to where the results will be saved
headerComment - Descriptive comment that will be placed at the top of the file
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

AppendMatrixRows

public static void AppendMatrixRows(java.util.ArrayList<NameValuePair> nameValuePairs,
                                    java.lang.String outFilePath)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
Adds name-value pairs as rows to a matrix file.

Parameters:
nameValuePairs - List of name-value pairs
outFilePath - Path to where the data will be saved
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

CombineMatrixFiles

public static void CombineMatrixFiles(java.lang.String headerComment,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> inFilePaths,
                                      java.lang.String outFilePath,
                                      boolean averageRepeatValues,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> columnNames)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
Takes multiple existing matrix files and merges them column-wise into a single matrix file.

Parameters:
headerComment - Descriptive comment that will be placed at the top of the file
inFilePaths - A list of input files that will be merged
outFilePath - Where the output will be stored
averageRepeatValues - Whether to average all values in a row
columnNames - Column names that will be added to the header
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

GetAllIterationFilePaths

public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> GetAllIterationFilePaths(java.lang.String filePathPattern)
                                                                      throws java.lang.Exception
When an experiment is conducted over multiple iterations, this method retrieves the paths to files specific to each iteration.

Parameters:
filePathPattern - The file pattern to look for
Returns:
All matching file paths
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
